name: 10 Lil Monkeys - SMS Game
description:
This app will send the children's song "10 Little Monkeys Jumping On The Bed" as individual sms text messages to a recipient from your contacts. Simple to use!

  1. Select a contact
  2. Set Number of Monkeys (Default is 10) Optional
  3. Set Timer in Seconds (Default is 10 seconds) Optional
  4. Press Send!
  5. Watch the timers, if you close app too early, it will stop sending.
  6. Enjoy!
